name: Youtube - Wide video container
description: Makes the main video container on youtube wider. Especially on a 2K monitor the default youtube container is ridiculously narrow, but even on 1080p using this means at least one more column of videos visible. Turn on "Fade++ compatibility mode" to use with Fade++ YT now uses a different system for displaying the videos on (only) the homepage. Due to how it works, manipulating it via CSS only is difficult. I have opted to just disable all extra CSS rules for the home page. If you'd like to see the home page improved, please use >this script< instead. Subscriptions page and all others should work as before. I may or may not keep updating this here. The script version is the superior version. I suggest using it instead.
